sys_script.name: ERP case import set assigning

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_ae225e9e93db0210d739b1dcebba107d
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_1166825_erp_assi_erp_case</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>ERP case import set assigning</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	var impset = current.getValue('import_set');
	gs.info('logs after value'+impset);
	if(impset){
		gs.info('log inside if BR');
		current.setValue('description','testing');
		current.setValue('priority',1);  
		current.update();
		var productGR = new GlideRecord('x_1166825_erp_assi_erp_product');
        productGR.addQuery('import_set', impset); // Use the correct field name
        productGR.query();

        // Log the number of records found
        gs.info('Number of product records found with the import set reference: ' + productGR.getRowCount());

        while (productGR.next()) {
            // Set the ERP case reference in the product record
            productGR.setValue('u_reference_1', current.sys_id); // Ensure 'u_reference_1' is the correct field for ERP Case reference
            productGR.update();

            // Log each update
            gs.info('Updated product record with Sys ID: ' + productGR.sys_id + ' and ERP Case Reference: ' + current.sys_id);
        }
	}
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-07-12 04:16:49</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>ae225e9e93db0210d739b1dcebba107d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>27</sys_mod_count><sys_name>ERP case import set assigning</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="ERP ASSIST" source="x_1166825_erp_assi">cf7d84d797324a50e3e737d3f153af4b</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="ERP ASSIST">cf7d84d797324a50e3e737d3f153af4b</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_ae225e9e93db0210d739b1dcebba107d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-07-12 17:47:17</sys_updated_on><template>description=test^EQ</template><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=ae225e9e93db0210d739b1dcebba107d"/></record_update>
